titles.title: To revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.
Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 11/21/2013--Introduced. Revises the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina by replacing maps subtitled "Lea Island Complex L07," "Wrightsville Beach Unit L08, Masonboro Island Unit L09," and "Masonboro Island Unit L09" with other maps with the same names of a date to be specified.
